Package phantom.world

A collection of world apis

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Area
    Used to Create an instance of a spherical area based on a central location Great for efficiently checking if an entity is within a spherical area.
    Blocks
    Blocks utilities
    Chunklet
    4x4 chunklet area based on the chunk grid
    ChunkletMesh
    A bunch of chunklets for fast reads
    Chunks
    Chunk utils
    Cuboid
    Cuboids
    Dimension
    Dimensions
    MaterialBlock
    Material blocks
    PE
    Fast potion effects like this

    PE.HEAL.d(40).a(2).c(); >> PotionEffect (a = amp; d = dur; c = create)
    PE.HEAL.d(40).a(2).c(Player p) >> Apply potion effect;
    RayTrace
    Ray Tracing! Start at a location and override the trace function to manually raytrace.
    SnowLevel
    Represents a snow level
    VariableBlock
    Represents a block that can be multiple blocks (used for variable schematics)
    VectorSchematic
    Vector schematics
    W
    World utils
    Worlds
    World utils
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlastResistance
    Blast resistance
    Cuboid.CuboidDirection  
    DimensionFace
    Represents a dimension (coordinates not worlds)
    Direction
    Directions
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CuboidException
    Represents a cuboid exception
